edu.mines.jtk.sgl

Class TensorsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.Node
      • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.AxisAlignedPanel
        • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.TensorsPanel

  • public class TensorsPanel
extends AxisAlignedPanel
    An axis-aligned panel that displays a slice of a 3D metric tensor field. The tensors correspond to symmetric positive-definite 3x3 matrices, and are rendered as ellipsoids.
    Version:
    2009.08.29
    Author:
    Chris Engelsma and Dave Hale, Colorado School of Mines.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a tensors panel for the specified tensor field.

      Constructs a tensors panel for the specified tensor field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TensorsPanel

        public TensorsPanel(EigenTensors3 et)
        Constructs a tensors panel for the specified tensor field. Assumes default unit samplings.
        Parameters:
        et - the eigentensors; by reference, not by copy.

      • TensorsPanel

        public TensorsPanel(Sampling s1,
            Sampling s2,
            Sampling s3,
            EigenTensors3 et)
        Constructs a tensors panel for the specified tensor field.
        Parameters:
        s1 - sampling of 1st dimension (Z axis).
        s2 - sampling of 2nd dimension (Y axis).
        s3 - sampling of 3rd dimension (X axis).
        et - the eigentensors; by reference, not by copy.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the panel. This method should be called when the tensor field referenced by this tensors panel has been modified.

      • setEllipsoidSize

        public void setEllipsoidSize(int size)
        Sets the maximum size of the ellipsoids. As this size is increased, the number of ellipsoids decreases.
        Parameters:
        size - the maximum ellipsoid size, in samples.

      • draw

        protected void draw(DrawContext dc)
        Description copied from class: Node
        Draws this node. This implementation does nothing.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Node
        Parameters:
        dc - the draw context.
